favourites.favouritesEmptyDescription: Save time and pay your bills swiftly and hassle-free. Let's get started by adding your first favourite meter!

paymentResult.tipLabel: You can retrieve your receipt or "Continue" to save your meter number

saveMeter.voucherNotRetrievedTitle: Your Credelec Payment of 350 MT is Underway
saveMeter.voucherNotRetrievedSubtitle: "You will receive an SMS notification shortly with your Voucher"

favourites.favouriteRemoveError: We appear to be having trouble removing your favourite meter. Please try again.

addFavourite.favouriteAddError: We appear to be having trouble adding your new favourite meter. Please try again.
addFavourite.selectFavouriteLabel: Para adicionar um número de contador como favorito, por favor atribua um nome ao contador.

editFavourite.favouriteEditError: We appear to be having trouble updating your favourite meter. Please try again.

replaceFavourite.warningLbl: Choose the meter you want to delete. By replacing a favourite, you will lose the details of the eliminated meter
replaceFavourite.favouriteReplaceError: We appear to be having trouble replacing your favourite meter. Please try again.

favouriteAdded.successLbl: You have successfully added your new favourite meter

paymentsHistory.toastError: We appear to be having trouble getting your payments. Please try again.

step1.title: What is Credelec?
step1.description: Credelec is an M-Pesa services that helps you to quickly, easily and conveniently purchase your electricity units

step2.title: What do I need to buy Credelec?
step2.descriptionPart1:
You just need to:
1. Have your electricity

confirmFavouriteDelete.title: Remove favourite meter
confirmFavouriteDelete.body1: You will be removing this favourite from the list. Would you like to continue?

favouriteLimit.title: Favourite limit reached
favouriteLimit.body1: You already have 5 favourite meters. If you want to save this new meter you need to remove an existing one

replaceLimit.title: Replace favourite meter
replaceLimit.body1: By selecting {{old_name}} you will delete this favourite meter to add {{new_name}} as a new favourite. Do you want do continue?

common.genericErrorToast: We appear to be having trouble getting your details. Please try again.

receipt.title: Transaction details
receipt.unableToDownload: At this time is not possible to retrieve your receipt. Try again
